title: Tag proposal: fediverse
description:
With the increased interest in the Fediverse (encompassing applications using ActivityPub, Diaspora and others), I believe the time has come for a dedicated tag.

This will enable users to filter these stories, especially as they tend to shade into cultural/ideological discussions rather than purely technical.

Stories from the last 7 days:

  • Honk into ActivityPub
  • Installing Mastodon inside a FreeBSD jail
  • in which legibility comes at a price [on the fediverse]
  • The RapidBlock Project
  • Towards End-to-End Encryption for Direct Messages in the Fediverse
  • Self-hosting GoToSocial on NixOS
  • Should Lobsters profiles include a/multiple Fediverse links?
  • Tracking Mastodon user numbers over time with a bucket of tricks
  • What are your favorite Mastodon technology/programming community servers
  • Scaling Mastodon in the Face of an Exodus
  • The Fediverse Could Be Awesome (if we don‚Äôt screw it up)
description_plain:
With the increased interest in the [Fediverse](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fediverse) (encompassing applications using ActivityPub, Diaspora and others), I believe the time has come for a dedicated tag.

This will enable users to filter these stories, especially as they tend to shade into cultural/ideological discussions rather than purely technical. 

Stories from the last 7 days:

* [Honk into ActivityPub](https://lobste.rs/s/yjgxsm/honk_into_activitypub)
* [Installing Mastodon inside a FreeBSD jail](https://lobste.rs/s/f59yfr/installing_mastodon_inside_freebsd_jail)
* [in which legibility comes at a price [on the fediverse]](https://lobste.rs/s/ei8kfs/which_legibility_comes_at_price_on)
* [The RapidBlock Project](https://lobste.rs/s/retmfy/rapidblock_project)
* [Towards End-to-End Encryption for Direct Messages in the Fediverse ](https://lobste.rs/s/9uvaqs/towards_end_end_encryption_for_direct)
* [Self-hosting GoToSocial on NixOS](https://lobste.rs/s/lfyi9e/self_hosting_gotosocial_on_nixos)
* [Should Lobsters profiles include a/multiple Fediverse links?](https://lobste.rs/s/bdyq17/should_lobsters_profiles_include)
* [Tracking Mastodon user numbers over time with a bucket of tricks](https://lobste.rs/s/juznrz/tracking_mastodon_user_numbers_over_time)
* [What are your favorite Mastodon technology/programming community servers](https://lobste.rs/s/4yyai6/what_are_your_favorite_mastodon)
* [Scaling Mastodon in the Face of an Exodus](https://lobste.rs/s/r4u62z/scaling_mastodon_face_exodus)
* [The Fediverse Could Be Awesome (if we don‚Äôt screw it up)](https://lobste.rs/s/9w29so/fediverse_could_be_awesome_if_we_don_t)

Lobsters rules:

 * Always upvote langdev, osdev or gamedev
 * Strongly avoid medium or twitter links
 * Strongly avoid any thread where the number of comments exceeds the number of upvotes
